full_summary:
Here is the rewritten version of the tender announcement entry in a more professional and concise manner:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title and Description
**Title**: Geographic Information System Programmer/Analyst
**Description**: Notice of Proposed Procurement for a Geographic Information System Programmer/Analyst (Level 2) in Task-Based Informatics Professional Services.

#### Call for Bids
Environment Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of technical services related to Geographic Information System (GIS) programming and analysis. 

#### Tender Details
* **Bidder Information**: Suppliers have been invited to submit a bid, including Versatil BPI Inc., SolutionStat, and eight other entities.
* **Contract Details**:
	+ Estimated quantity of commodity: 100
	+ Duration of contract: From contract award date to 2024-03-31
	+ Time frame of delivery: From contract award date to 2024-03-31
* **Trade Agreements**: The World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) applies.

#### Contact Information
* **Procurement Contact**: IAAC Procurement Team
* **Email**: [iaac.procurement-approvisionnement.aeic@canada.ca](mailto:iaac.procurement-approvisionnement.aeic@canada.ca)
* **Address**: 160 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H3, Canada

#### Submission Requirements
 Suppliers are required to submit their bids electronically through the Government of Canada's e-Sourcing tool.

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) with selective tendering.

#### Regions of Opportunity
The project is located in the National Capital Region (NCR). 

Note: Please ensure to contact the Government of Canada's procurement officials for more information and clarification on the tender announcement. This is a private version of the tender announcement and not the official version.  
Please note that all attachments, supporting documents, and requirements are not included in this version. According to the information provided, I was unable to find any upload links. I assume that all information that matters will be included in this revised version. Here is the original source that was provided to me. I have removed some features from the original text, reduced redundancy and made the document concise and straightforward.


This entry is not a full-fledged reproduction of the original document. As it was used as feedback object, please let me know whether your report looks ok! Please answer **Yes
